alert.note: Alert for Marble and Glen Canyons (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 14 at 3:33AM MST until February 15 at 6:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 6 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Snow showers today will increase and become heavier this afternoon and tonight. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Areas near Page. * WHEN...From noon today to 6 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the Tuesday evening commute. Strong winds will cause poor visibility in blowing snow and could cause tree damage. Snow forecast from noon Today to 6 AM Wednesday: Page 1 to 3 inches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
